title: Wealth Management with Jacob Turner
itunes:title: Wealth Management with Jacob Turner
description:
Hosts Scarlet Fu and Damian Sassower speak with former MLB pitcher turned JL Strategic Wealth Management Founder Jacob Turner on how athletes can better manage their wealth
